string.text:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,204,0,51]low
 
%c[0,170,170,170]This modern military armored suit is designed for assault operations in anomalous areas. Mainly designed for Spetsnaz Units for the purposes of high risk operations. Comprises a PSZ-12p heavy military armored suit, built-in compensation suit, and an anomalous protection bodysuit. The armor provides excellent protection against bullet and fragmentation damage, without greatly reducing the wearer's mobility. Comes with built-in armor attachment modules.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] heavy outfit
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs (+48%)
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]26 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]3,5 kw / m2
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protection %c[0,170,170,170]ineligible
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]597 kV
%c[0,170,170,170]BALLISTIC PROTECTION CLASSES:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Torso: %c[0,170,170,170]IV
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Shoulders: %c[0,170,170,170]IV
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Arms: %c[0,170,170,170]III
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Hands: %c[0,170,170,170]IIIA
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thighs: %c[0,170,170,170]III
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Knees and calves: %c[0,170,170,170]IV
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Feet: %c[0,170,170,170]IV

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,170,170,170]medium
 
%c[0,170,170,170]A standard military overcoat that will keep the wearer warm during rain and strong winds. It offers little to no protection but allows for a few armor attachments by default.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very light outfit
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs (+22%)
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]26 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]3,5 kw / m2
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protection %c[0,170,170,170]ineligible
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]597 kV

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,170,170,170]medium
 
%c[0,170,170,170]A long overcoat. It is enforced with a special padding around the torso and the head, which allows it to serve as low grade anti-anomaly armor. It is best used in conjunction with a gas mask or closed-breathing apparatus. It allows for the application of three armor attachments by default.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very light outfit
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs (+24%)
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]46 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]9 kw / m2
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protection %c[0,170,170,170]ineligible
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]760 kV
%c[0,170,170,170]BALLISTIC PROTECTION CLASSES:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Torso: %c[0,170,170,170]I

%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Arms: %c[0,170,170,170]none
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Hands: %c[0,170,170,170]none

%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Knees and calves: %c[0,170,170,170]I
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Feet: %c[0,170,170,170]IIA

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,170,170,170]medium
 
%c[0,170,170,170]A long and thick overcoat with extra padding for added protection. Can serve as low-grade anti-anomaly armor, but is best used in conjunction with a gas mask or closed-breathing apparatus. It allows for the application of two armor attachments by default.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] light outfit
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs (+28%)
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]50 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]12 kw / m2
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protection %c[0,170,170,170]ineligible
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]1065 kV
%c[0,170,170,170]BALLISTIC PROTECTION CLASSES:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Torso: %c[0,170,170,170]IIIA

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,170,170,170]medium
 
%c[0,170,170,170]A titanium helmet with cloth camouflage. Comes with pockets that can be filled with additional armor. Custom design, presumably never entered mass-production. M12 is the heaviest combat helmet available in the Zone, where it is normally used as a part of a set that includes also PSZ-series Spetsnaz body armor. The purpose of this helmet is clear: provide maximum head protection at the cost of increased weight.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] very heavy combat helmet
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs (+20%)
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] M12 titanium helmet %c[0,170,170,170]2420 g
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class IV anti-ballistic visor %c[0,170,170,170]370 g
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] breathing apparatus %c[0,170,170,170]145 g
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] PMK 40mm breathing filter %c[0,170,170,170]390 g
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. %c[0,170,170,170]1550 g
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]172 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]7 kw / m2
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protection %c[0,170,170,170]45 mT
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]67 kV
%c[0,170,170,170]BALLISTIC PROTECTION CLASSES:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Head: %c[0,170,170,170]V
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Eyes: %c[0,170,170,170]IV
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Jaw: %c[0,170,170,170]V
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Neck: %c[0,170,170,170]III

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,204,0,51]low
 
%c[0,170,170,170]A standard steel army helmet without any additional elements. Produced in Russia. Provides no protection against anomalies or radiation, but can deflect bullets - effectively preventing damage to the head. This helmet has never been particularly popular in the Zone, except for the use in brief armed conflicts between factions.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medium combat helmet
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs (+16%)
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] M40 steel helmet %c[0,170,170,170]2480 g
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class IIIA anti-ballistic visor %c[0,170,170,170]190 g
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]negligible
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]1 kw / m2

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,51,255,102]high
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Environmental protection helmet which has been dismounted from a SSP-99 Ecologist full-body armor. Comes with a complete closed respiratory system. It features an airtight visor intended for complete insulation from environmental conditions. May be combined with most military suits to improve their effectiveness in anomalous areas.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] heavy environmental helmet
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs (+22%)
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:

%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] SSP closed resp. module %c[0,170,170,170]1460 g

%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] PN21KL nvd with mount. %c[0,170,170,170]1110 g

%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Jaw: %c[0,170,170,170]III

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,51,255,102]high
 
%c[0,170,170,170]A modernized, significantly more compact version of classic EO-19 PBF gas mask. Updated EO-20 particulate filters underwent a significant miniaturization, but their protective properties were increased nevertheless. Radiation shielding has also been enhanced thanks to the implementation of lead elements in the apparatus. It should be noted, however, that while it serves its purpose well in areas of increased radioactivity levels, the mask suffers from a high failure rate in toxic environments and is also prone to get irreversibly damaged if subjected to direct impact.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] light gas mask
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs (+11%)
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] PBF gas mask %c[0,170,170,170]760 g
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] 2x EO-19 breathing filter %c[0,170,170,170]210 g
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]106 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]negligible
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protection %c[0,170,170,170]negligible
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]64 kV
%c[0,170,170,170]BALLISTIC PROTECTION CLASSES:

%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Jaw: %c[0,170,170,170]none
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Neck: %c[0,170,170,170]none

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,170,170,170]medium
 
%c[0,170,170,170]A simple piece of cloth forming a mask. It is often used by Stalkers to prevent deadly radiation particles from entering the body and is usually worn at all times as a form of precaution. The mask, however suited for such purpose, is not without defects as it will not protect from large concentrations of radioactive particles and the material will gradually absorb such quantities that it'll become not only incapable of protection but also dangerous to the user. It is thus advisable to take spare masks when venturing into the Zone for longer periods of time.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] cloth wrap
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs, weapon maintenance (+4%)
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] single layer of thick cloth %c[0,170,170,170]224 g
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]negligible
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]negligible
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protection %c[0,170,170,170]none
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]negligible
%c[0,170,170,170]BALLISTIC PROTECTION CLASSES:
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Head: %c[0,170,170,170]none
%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Eyes: %c[0,170,170,170]none

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,51,255,102]high
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PMK set is built around a single, multi-layered, 40 mm breathing filter placed on the left side of valve apparatus. Reinforced construction makes it more resistant to physical damage at the cost of even more extra weight. The PMK mask was designed for use by Ukrainian Spetsnaz but never went into mass production.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medium gas mask

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,170,170,170]medium
 
%c[0,170,170,170]A modern, high-quality, Western-made combat helmet with built-in air filtration system. Comes with multiple layers of Kevlar and hard armor to protect the user from physical damage. As it is made entirely from composites, it does not conduct electricity, thus rising overall electrical resistance of the user.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] heavy gas mask
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs (+18%)

%c[0,93,0,116] • %c[0,140,140,140] Eyes: %c[0,170,170,170]IV

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,170,170,170]medium
 
%c[0,170,170,170]This lightweight stalker bodysuit is made by Freedom craftsmen. The suit's fabric is treated with Horizon, a special solution developed by the faction by trial and error, to increase resistance to anomalies. Like the Sunrise suit, the Wind of Freedom comes with built-in body armor and armor attachment modules.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,170,170,170]medium
 
%c[0,170,170,170]This modern version of Duty bodysuit is better suited for stalker recruits who are used to lightweight suits. Unlike the PSZ series, this suit provides good protection against anomalies while also being capable of stopping a pistol bullet. The suit cannot be modified with an armor attachment module, but may be upgraded with a combat support system instead.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,204,0,51]low
 
%c[0,170,170,170]This modern military armored suit is designed for assault operations in anomalous areas. Mainly designed for Spetsnaz Units for the purposes of high risk operations. Comprises a PSZ-12p heavy military armored suit, built-in compensation suit, and an anomalous protection bodysuit. The armor provides excellent protection against bullet and fragmentation damage, without greatly reducing the wearer's mobility. Comes with built-in armor attachment modules.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,51,255,102]high
 
%c[0,170,170,170]This bodysuit, intended for conducting research in the Zone, combines a closed-cycle respiratory module and an external isolation coating, resulting in excellent protection from anomalies. Due to poor protection from physical impact, the suit provides very low defense against bullet and fragmentation damage. Comes with a built-in armor attachment module.

%c[0,170,170,170]This item comprises military PS5 series body armor and beryllium sputter modified for use in the Zone. Designed for assault operations in high-radiation conditions, it is ineffective in areas of anomalous activity. The suit makes its way to the stalker community through the military, who exchange it for loot. Comes with built-in armor attachment modules.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,170,170,170]medium
 
%c[0,170,170,170]This DIY stalker bodysuit is a combination of a bodysuit made of twin-layered rubberized cloth with plexiglass lining and built-in body armor. Despite the fact that the body armor is incapable of protecting the wearer even from pistol bullets, the suit enjoys great popularity due to its low cost and modification potential. Comes with built-in armor attachment modules.

%c[0,170,170,170]This stalker bodysuit with reinforced body armor made by Freedom craftsmen represents a good compromise between combat and anomaly protection. The built-in body armor comprises armor plating and ten Kevlar layers, which makes it capable of stopping a pistol bullet. The suit uses relatively expensive Sovereign compound for anomaly protection. Comes with an armor attachment module.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,204,0,51]low
 
%c[0,170,170,170]This early model of the Duty bodysuit is the Spetsnaz PSZ-9 body armor modified in the Zone. The suit is capable of stopping a rifle bullet, however, this level of protection comes at the cost of its weight, bulkiness and virtually non-existent anomaly protection. The suit cannot be modified with an armor attachment module, but may be upgraded with a combat support system.

%c[0,170,170,170]Once used as standard by Clear Sky assault squads, after the faction's elimination this armor serves as a reminder that even an excellent protective bodysuit cannot guarantee your safety if you're on the wrong side of the perimeter. The armor is capable of stopping a pistol bullet, while the wearer is also reasonably protected from anomalies. Comes with a built-in armor attachment module.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,204,0,51]low
 
%c[0,170,170,170]An experimental sample of a military exoskeleton. Did not enter mass-production due to extraordinarily high cost and some design flaws. Despite this, it is in demand due to its ability to take on the weight of all carried equipment, and therefore small batches are made in underground facilities outside Ukraine. The exoskeleton suit is very expensive and anyone who wears one of these should be avoided unless you have a death wish.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,51,255,102]high
 
%c[0,170,170,170]A SSP-99 chemical protection suit specifically designed for the Zone. It is used primarily by scientific expeditions and eco-stalkers. It has an integrated air filtering and conditioning system, thanks to which it offers excellent protection against radiation and chemical agents. It also includes a so called anomaly suppression system which provides exceptional heat and electrical resistance. Not fit for combat purposes, so it provides neither bullet nor splinter protection. Includes a multi-compartment armor attachment module.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medium closed-respiratory outfit
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for: %c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs (+28%)

%c[0,170,170,170]Modified SSP-99 suit. It provides increased body protection from bullet and splinter damage. It is designed for the guards working with scientific expeditions as it provides good protection from radiation and biological anomalies. It is also resistant to chemical anomalies and other forms of anomalous threats. Includes a multi-compartment armor attachment module.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class proficiency: %c[0,170,170,170]medium
 
%c[0,170,170,170]A ghillie suit is a type of camouflage clothing designed to resemble heavy foliage. It is a net or cloth garment covered in loose strips of burlap, cloth or twine, sometimes made to look like leaves and twigs, and optionally augmented with scraps of foliage from the area. Snipers and hunters may wear a ghillie suit to blend into their surroundings and conceal themselves from enemies or targets. The suit gives the wearer's outline a three-dimensional breakup, rather than a linear one. When manufactured correctly, the suit will move in the wind in the same way as surrounding foliage.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]PROPERTIES:
